title: Every Day
lyrics:
Yojeum-eun maeil bam-e nun-eul tteo
Jeonyeog-e haluleul sijaghae nan
Geulae nan
Jigeum-eun ilsang-i maeil pyeonhande
Geunde wae ileohge nan achim-eul boji mos halkka



Jal iss-eo neoege geonnen mal

Jal jinae neoege mudgopa



Geuttaeui nan neomu eolyeoss-eossji

Neoege bachin heugjangmi

Please forgive me

I was wrong

Geulae mwol hadeon michigess-eo

Gyedan-e anj-eul ttae neoleul deul-eul ttaemada

Naneun neol gieoghae maeilmaeil



Dasi uliga salanghal ttaelo sigan-i dol-agandamyeon

Neoleul bol su issdamyeon

Maeilmaeil gidohandago geuttaelo dol-agalago

An doeneun geol almyeonseo



Ileohge nan

Maeilmaeilmaeil babocheoleom

Maeilmaeilmaeil mogswidolog

Maeilmaeilmaeil tto buleugo

Maeilmaeilmaeil neol gidalyeo



Neon badaya nan ttwieodeul-eo mos heeo nawado dwae

I'm gonna die baby neolo inhae ije sum gappeuge dwae

When I`m alone nan Domino gat-a

Gwaenhi kkeonaebolyeo haeseo dasi onmom-eulo oyeolhaessdeon bam



Heuleuneun nunmul galiji ma

Nae pum-e angyeo gwaenchanh-a



Kkoch-i pigo jigo

Dasi pigo gyejeol-i bakkwieodo

Uli salang-eun yeong-wonhal geolago



Hanaman yagsoghalge

Dasi mannaneun geunalkkaji

I ma-eum byeonhaji anhgi



Dasi uliga salanghal ttaelo sigan-i dol-agandamyeon

Neoleul bol su issdamyeon

Maeilmaeil gidohandago geuttaelo dol-agalago

An doeneun geol almyeonseo



Ileohge nan

Maeilmaeilmaeil babocheoleom

Maeilmaeilmaeil mogswidolog

Maeilmaeilmaeil tto buleugo

Maeilmaeilmaeil neol gidalyeo



Eonjenga neol dasi mannandamyeon

Malhago sip-eo kkog hago sip-eo

Neowa na anin ulilo

Dol-agal su iss-eulkka



Jeongmal dol-agal su iss-eulkka



Dasi uliga salanghal ttaelo sigan-i dol-agandamyeon

Neoleul bol su issdamyeon

Maeilmaeil gidohandago geuttaelo dol-agalago

An doeneun geol almyeonseo



Ileohge nan

Maeilmaeilmaeil babocheoleom

Maeilmaeilmaeil mogswidolog

Maeilmaeilmaeil tto buleugo

Maeilmaeilmaeil neol gidalyeo
